title: Horror Music Pack Vol.1
description: The Horror Music Pack Vol.1 is a great collection of scary and creepy tracks that will raise the fear and tension levels of any project! Over 30 minutes of music, jam-packed with 17 professionally recorded cinematic spooky tracks!
longDescription:
The Horror Music Pack Vol.1 is a great collection of scary, creepy tracks that will raise the fear and tension levels of any project! Over 30 minutes of music, jam-packed with 17 professionally recorded cinematic spooky tracks! These tunes will help you create the perfect eerie underscore texture for your project! A wide variety of dark moods, and tempos.

Excellent for games and apps in the Sci-Fi, Horror, Drama, Tense, Suspenseful, and other worldly genres.

 

Tracks Included

1. Spirits Among Us

2. Mind Trauma

3. Predator Strike

4. Death March

5. Scene Of The Crime

6. Solitude

7. Scary Boss

8. The Hunter

9. Dead Ahead

10. Idle Mind

11. Night Sweats

12. Darkest Fears

13. Hiding Inside

14. Reality Check

15. Disappear

16. Boss Tracker

17. The Hunter II

Enhance the eerie and scary elements of your project with music and ambients that fit perfectly!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  17 Professionally created and recorded tracks by award winning composer Craig Dodge!
  • SoundCloud Sampler: https://soundcloud.com/user-512388516/horror-music-pack-vol1-video-game-music-sampler
  •  IMDB: http://www.imdb.com/name/nm6277420/
  •  Website: www.taris-studios.com

Number of Audio Wavs: 17

Number of Audio Cues: 17

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 30

Supported Development Platforms: All Platforms

Supported Target Build Platforms: All Platforms
